title: Rights group challenges trans-inclusive swimming policy at Hampstead Heath
description: Allowing entry on the basis of self-identification of gender rather than biological sex is unlawful, high court told
content:
Rules permitting trans women to share female changing facilities and swim in a women-only pond are discriminatory and unlawful, the high court has heard.
The City of London Corporation is breaching equality legislation by allowing trans people to use... [3675 chars]

title: 'I learned languages and travelled Europe through Erasmus'
description: Several years after it was scrapped, the UK is now set to rejoin the Erasmus scheme in 2027.
content:
Living abroad while at university allowed me to become almost fluent in two other languages and have experiences that would never have been possible in Scotland.
While studying at the University of Glasgow in 2021, I moved to Germany aged 19 to work ... [3230 chars]

title: Woman accused of killing girls with poison raspberries pulled from Thames
description: Ines de Bedout, 14, and close friend Emilia Forero, 13, died days after consuming the berries allegedly poisoned by Zulma Guzman Castro.
content:
A fugitive accused of killing two schoolgirls with poisoned chocolate-covered raspberries was pulled alive from the River Thames.
Zulma Guzman Castro was rescued from the water close to Battersea Bridge, west London, on Tuesday morning.
The businessw... [3053 chars]

title: EU axes 2035 petrol and diesel car sales ban but UK holds firm on 2030
description: From 2035, 10 per cent of car sales in the EU can comprise hybrid, plug-in hybrid or even standard petrol and diesel cars
content: The UK Government has doubled down on its pledge to ban the sale of pure-petrol and diesel cars by 2030 and all non-zero-emissions models by 2035. This comes after the EU made the monumental decision to scrap its own 2035 ban, sending a seismic wave ... [6149 chars]

title: RAF cortege for soldier as Oxfordshire mourners pay respects
description: People paid their respects today to a British paratrooper killed in a “tragic accident” in Ukraine. He was repatriated to RAF Brize Norton
content:
The body of Lance Corporal George Hooley, 28, was repatriated to RAF Brize Norton in west Oxfordshire following his death last week.
A private, family-only ceremony was held at the country’s largest RAF station before L/Cpl Hooley’s body was carried ... [2466 chars]
